law.text: The use or possession of controlled substances, alcohol or ABC law violations and acts of violence on the premises or in parking areas provided by the permittee for its patrons of an establishment holding an amplified entertainment permit are prohibited. Violation of any of these conditions is punishable according to the schedule of fines, penalties and suspensions set out in ยง12-2124. (Ord. No. 1999-539, ยง1, 4-6-99; Ord.
